definition: official records/grade (of goods)/file/records/shelves/slot/gap/crosspiece/classifier for crosspieces/classifier for events, affairs etc/Taiwan pr. [dang3]

sentences.english: File your writing in your portfolio.
Lastly, we work out eight principles of constructing a sound English writing process portfolio.
sentences.chinese: 最後，我們提出構建英語寫作檔案袋的八大原則。

sentences.english: What sort of work goes into the Student Work Record?
sentences.chinese: 什麼樣的作品可以被放進學生檔案袋？

sentences.english: Fetch me those Brown files right now.
sentences.chinese: 馬上幫我查一下布朗名下的檔案袋。

sentences.english: First we need the manilla cardboard for the spine of the cover.
sentences.chinese: 首先我們要用到檔案袋的牛皮紙來做書脊部分的封面。
